SWRL: Syntax XML Example
Example:
hasParent (?x,?y) ^ hasBrother(?y, ?z) Æ hasUncle(?x, ?z)
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
113
OWL and SWRL
What is the SWRL Tab? 
•
The SWRL Tab is an extension to the Protégé-OWL Plugin (not yet in
version 4) that permits the creation and execution of SWRL rules.
•
The editor can be used to create SWRL rules, edit existing SWRL
rules, and read and write SWRL rules.
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
